ngiemboon: Nkáŋ nnɛ́ wɔ́ɔn té ne ńdáŋa wɔ́.
en: My body is not doing well.

ngiemboon: N zɛté yé nò, á láŋa le nkwáʼ.
en: I asked him what the problem was, he was speechless.
This child is in good shape.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gẅiin ndàʼ ndólà tá.
Mèŋ n ge gwaa tó, mbà à ně ńdáʼ ńgʉa.
en: Before I got there, he would already be gone.

ngiemboon: Ńdaʼ páʼ ɔ̀ ge ńná nkáb yɔ̀ɔn mie ɔ̀ ka fu.
en: You have to give me the money you borrowed.
He returned to the village forever.
